transcript: They just all as one turn around and start swimming to this very point where we're standing right now for one last celebration of sex and death! God, it's giving me goosebumps, look at all the little hairs! I'm standing up!

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: they just all as one turn around and start swimming to this very point where we are standing now for one last celebration of sex and death. God, it's giving me Goosebumps.  Look at all the hairs that are standing up.
